text: De, yila Gotkɨk Wulu Kumbaŋgikɨk Balañju*, valan Farisitɨle* autu toneve, valan wuleve Jisasɨlɨn yisɨwɨ jeñjek jiveve yila yaka wulu pavale balañjundi yila takis yivaŋgapale balañjundi. Kapekandi valan wokok guŋgundatɨk kavik kombɨiyeve, “Takis yivaŋgapale balañjundi yaka wulu pavale balañjundi Jisasɨlɨn jeñjek aipaŋga jiva?”
